scripts.start: yarn docker:build; yarn docker:run; yarn docker:logs
scripts.docker:build-prod: echo Image tag?; read _tag; docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t sturmenta/docker-ts-template:$_tag .
scripts.docker:push-prod: echo Image tag?; read _tag; docker push sturmenta/docker-ts-template:$_tag
scripts.docker:build-and-push-prod: echo Image tag?; read _tag; docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t sturmenta/docker-ts-template:$_tag .; docker push sturmenta/docker-ts-template:$_tag
